metadata.title: CVE-2017-11503 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.description:
PHPMailer 5.2.23 has XSS in the "From Email Address" and "To Email Address"fields of code_generator.php.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-11503` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libphp-phpmailer - 5.2.14+dfsg-1ubuntu0.1~esm2
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: libphp-phpmailer package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.2.14+dfsg-1ubuntu0.1~esm2').
